long_description: Fashion meets function with the Smith Mastermind polarized sunglasses. They feature crisp, smart styling with strategic performance details that make them-and you-ready for action. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Black frames feaure gray-tint lenses, ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Tortoise, Whiskey and Black Olive Fade frames feature brown-tint lenses that enhance your vision in a wide range of light and weather conditions. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants. Hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: Fashion meets function with the Smith Mastermind polarized sunglasses. They feature crisp, smart styling with strategic performance details that make them-and you-ready for action.
